item.title: XRechnung
item.description: Connector 365 XRechnung Online Help Here you will find all help and learning resources, for our Microsoft AppSource XRechnung App. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be glad to help you personally. You can find the necessary contact information on the Support Page.
